Search mangal networks

Source: R/search_networks.R
search_networks.Rd

Search mangal networks

search_networks(query = NULL, verbose = TRUE, ...)

Arguments

query

character keyword used to search (case sensitive) or a sf object used to search in a specific geographical area.
verbose

a logical. Should extra information be reported on progress?
...

arguments from rmangal::get_gen(), ignored for spatial query.

Value

data.frame object with all networks informations Class returned mgSearchNetworks

Examples

search_networks(query="insect%")
#> Found 14 networks

# NOT RUN {
# Spatial query
library(USAboundaries)
area <- us_states(state="california")
networks_in_area <- search_networks(area)
plot(networks_in_area)
# }
